Detailed Description

This is a button class that provides text capabilities.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

phys::UI::TextButton::TextButton ( ConstString &  name,
const Vector2  Position,
const Vector2  Size,
const Whole  Glyph,
String  Text,
UILayer *  Layer 
)

Internal constructor.

Parameters:
name The name of the button.
Position The top left position of the button.
Size The size of the Button.
Glyph One of the glyphs specified in your gorilla file. Must be valid.
Text Any text you want printed on the button.
Layer Pointer to the Layer that created this button.
